properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The name of the Submenu for display in the user interface. The title includes any ampersand characters (&), which are used to tell the Windows OS to underline the following character in the name for use with the Alt key to navigate to a menu item. Double ampersands are used to display an actual ampersand character in the name. The Mac OS ignores and removes the extra ampersand characters.
The location of the submenu relative to the reference object or within the containing object. (Optional)
parameters.name: at
reference
parameters.description: The reference object. Note: Required when the at parameter specifies before or after. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new Submenu (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the Submenu.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the Submenu with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the Submenu with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the Submenus within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The Submenu, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Submenu, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The Submenu, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Submenu, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first Submenu in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last Submenu in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle Submenu in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the Submenu with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the Submenu that follows the desired Submenu.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the Submenu whose index follows the specified Submenu in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The Submenu whose index comes before the desired Submenu.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any Submenu in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every Submenu in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Submenu.
Returns the Submenu with the specified index.
